original: KEULSTRÖM, Erik Gustaf Fredrik, Civilingenjör, Katrineholm, f Älskog, Gotl, 4/11 00 av kyrkoh Gust K o Lydia Budin, gm Ruth Ahlstedt. Studex Visby 19, civingex KTH (maskinbyggn o mek tekn) 25. Anst v AB Arctic i Motala 27—28, USA 28—34, v SKF sed. 34, varav ss planeringschef v Katrineholmsverken sed. 38. Inneh fi skytteutmärkelser. Hobby: Skytte.
translated: KEULSTRÖM, Erik Gustaf Fredrik, Civil Engineer, Katrineholm, born Älskog, Gotland, November 4th, 1900, son of parish minister Gust K and Lydia Budin, married to Ruth Ahlstedt. Passed high school exams in Visby in 1919, obtained a civil engineering degree from the Royal Institute of Technology (KTH) specializing in mechanical engineering and machine technology in 1925. Employed by AB Arctic in Motala from 1927 to 1928, worked in the United States from 1928 to 1934, and has been working at SKF since 1934, including the position of planning manager at Katrineholmsverken since 1938. Holds several shooting awards. Hobby: Shooting.

education.studyType: Civil Engineering (Mechanical Engineering and Machine Technology)
